body_html:
Leave it to Apport to destroy any useful backtrace information haha.

What happens if you install a fresh Miniconda environment, install torch in it, and try it? I think that should probably fix your problem.

If you want to debug more, can you ls /usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/ and tell us what is in that directory?

body:
Leave it to Apport to destroy any useful backtrace information haha.

What happens if you install a fresh Miniconda environment, install torch in it, and try it? I think that should probably fix your problem.

If you want to debug more, can you `ls /usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/` and tell us what is in that directory?
